page.title: 17GAMES WE PLAY IN STOW
page.content: At school we have two playgrounds, one for boys and one for girls. In the girls' playground we play hopscotch and some singing games. Some singing games are played with a skipping rope. There are ball games as well, like Cinderella Umberella, who has got the ball? We play rounders, but there is not much room as the boys have got the big playground. They play football and chasing games. In the summer we have races and sometimes we all go in the big playground to race. We have PE in the boy's playground and in the winter we play netball with Mrs Robbins. The boys play football down on the playing field. In the summer we all go down to the field and we play rounders and the boys play cricket.
